pages.text: Generates water when place by a body of water.$(br2)A body of 7x3x7 pool of water will result in maximum efficiency. This efficiency is further modified by weather and biomes. Right click on intake to check water production
$(li)Beach, River, Ocean: x2 $(li)Mesa, Desert, Savanna: x0.2 $(li)Icy, Taiga: x0.8 $(li)Nether: x0 $(li)All else: x1
